notesStmt.note: The manuscript is imperfect at the beginning and at the end. There is also a lenghty lacuna after folio 2. Many leaves are more or less damaged.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A small part of the books of Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy in Saʻadia Gaon's translation.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square script, probably of 14th century.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Musuem from him on 08 July 1882.
